title: 15 of 2013) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Commission Regulation
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Temporary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Temporary 
Measures) (No.7) Regulations 2021 (Amendment) Regulations 2022 and, 
subject to Regulation 3, come into operation on 7 January 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited avian influenza (temporary measures) (no.7) regulation 2021 (amendment) regulation 2022 subject regulation 3 come operation 7 january 2022

title: 15 of 2013) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Commission Regulation
heading: 2. The Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) Regulations 2021 are
text_raw:
2. The Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) Regulations 2021 are 

amended – 

(a) 

(b) 

in Regulation 2, by the deletion of “protection zone 2, protection 
zone 4 and”, 

in Regulation 3 (a)by the deletion of “partly within protection 
zone 2, protection zone 4 or” and “protection zone 3,” and 
“protection zone 2, protection zone 4 or”, 

(c) 

by the substitution for Regulation 3 of- 

“3. Land or premises- 

(a) 

(b) 

that lies partly within protection zone 5 is deemed to 
lie wholly within that protection zone, and 

subject to paragraph (a), that lies partly within 
surveillance zone 5 and partly outside 
that 
surveillance zone is deemed to lie wholly within that 
surveillance zone.”, 

(d) 

in Part 3 of Schedule 1 by the deletion of “(apart from the 
townlands situate in protection zone 4)” in both places where it 
occurs, and 

(e) 

by the deletion of Part 2 and Part 4 of Schedule 2.

title: 15 of 2013) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Commission Regulation
heading: 3. From 8 January 2022, the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7)
text_raw:
3. From 8 January 2022, the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) 
Regulations 2021 are amended by the substitution for the matter in Part 1 of 
Schedule 1 of the matter in the Schedule to these Regulations. 

1 O.J, L 174 of 3.6.2020, 64; http://data.europa.eu/eli/reg_del/2020/687/oj 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Schedule 

[2] 3 

Regulation 3 

The Electoral Divisions of Clontibret, Cremartin, Annayalla Carrickaslane 
Castleblayney Rural, Castleblaney Urban Church Hill, the townlands of 
Dunmaurice, Terrygreghan, Clogher, Drumguillew Lower, Shane, Drumguillew 
Upper, Cabragh and Drumgarra in the Electoral Division of Greagh, the 
townlands of Lagan, and Cargagh in the Electoral Division of Laragh, the 
townlands of Drumgolat, Feddans, Drumbeg, Listinny, Shanmullagh, 
Annaseeragh, Ennis, Mullans, Clerran, Tirmacmoe, Moy Etra, Moy Otra, 
Corcaskea, Bryanlitter, Tulllybuck, Lisaginny situate in the Electoral Division 
of Castleshane, the townland of Ballycronin situate in the Electoral Division of 
Rathwallace, the townlands of Corfad, Corlongford, Cussaboy, Corraviller, 
Derrylusk, Cornahoe, Cornanagh, Tiromedan, Cordolough, Coohey, 
Corfinlough, Derryhallagh, Lennan, Drumroosk, Cargaghramer, Drumlongfield, 
Cornanure situate in the Electoral Division of Tullycorbet, all in county 
Monaghan. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 

5 January, 2022. 

JUNE FANNING, 

An officer authorised to authenticate the Seal of the 
Minister. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [2]

title: 15 of 2013) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Commission Regulation
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations provide for the removal of certain temporary measures 
formerly in place to combat the threat posed by avian influenza; most restrictions 
remain in place for the present. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [2] 5
